steps.summary: Successfully navigated to Insights page. Shows "市场洞察" (Market Insights) with AI Sector Risk category displaying 6 metrics.
AI Sector Risk details displayed with all 6 metrics. Each metric shows sparkline (img with alt text), score, status badge. Composite score: 54/100 (Elevated). Last updated: 12/28/2025, 5:05:26 PM.
Sparklines display single blue dot for today's datapoint (only 1 day of history). Composite score 54/100 with orange "偏高" (elevated) badge. Score breakdown shows all 6 weighted metrics.
Metric card expands on click (shows [expanded] state). Sparkline interaction works. With 1 datapoint, no additional history to swipe - behavior is correct for current data.
Loading states verified: Refresh button shows "刷新中..." (Refreshing...) with [disabled] state during data fetch. Loading feedback properly communicated to user.
